entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as thinking he knows what is coming.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also unenthusiastic about Hermione's cause.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry and Ron's friend, who is determined to pursue justice for house-elves.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione is advocating for justice for house-elves, as she believes they are being oppressed.
